title: What tactics were used by the French resistance during WWII? - Quora

response.answer_text: Spying, sabotage, guerilla, murder, like other partisans for example in poland. Sometime full resistance army tried to do more, but they were lacking of weapon and were serousily defeated by the nazi. More efficient tactic were shadows army tactic : Maquis du Vercors - Wikipedia Some were very usefull but some had tragical consequences, like this close to my home.Oradour-sur-Glane massacre - Wikipedia However Poland resistance we also tough, and they were very unlucky as they were between nazi and soviet army. Please look also to poland partisan . The germans were horrific in west europe, but beyond bestiality in east.
